Christopher T. Guy

About

Hello, my name is

Christopher T. Guy.

I'm a Certified Red Seal Electrician

I started writing computer code and learning frontend web development at the age of 50. 😍

I started in the electrical trade 2 days before my 20th birthday.

I thought I was making a decision that I would never have to make again.

That was 30 years ago!!!

"Make hay while the sun shines"

So I built things for 30 years

I learned how to Structure, Plan and Build Construction Projects

I had to grow with my Industry

I knew the world was Changing.

I needed to change with it.

HOW?

When I heard someone say "Computer Programming",

I heard gobbledygook Gibberish ,

Computer Programming was a bunch of symbols, letters and numbers which mean absolutely nothing to me.

I had some training and experience in logic circuits as an Electrician but nothing indepth, just basic theory with a little Electronics in the mix.

"Get with the Program"

That was the saying when I was a teenager.

"Learn to Code"

This is the saying I hear now.

"All roads lead to Rome"

"The Program"

"Home Work"
